violations_detected.title: Echo method not used
violations_detected.evidence: Customer name Denis (9:047-9:907ms) collected without systematic echo-back. City Yekaterinburg (19:607-20:627ms) echoed partially ('Город Екатеринбург') but no explicit confirmation ('Верно?'). Product code 26-27-72 provided but unclear confirmation of exact specifications. Contact data collected without formal echo method verification.

violations_detected.title: Long information search
violations_detected.evidence: Search duration from operator announcement 'сейчас посмотрю' at 1:51.105 to results delivery 'диски есть' at 3:09.658 = 78.7 seconds. This exceeds the 45-second threshold for information search completion.

coaching_priorities.issue: Echo method not properly implemented for contact data
coaching_priorities.recommendation: When collecting customer name, address, phone, or product specifications, must repeat back exactly what customer said and ask 'Верно?' or 'Правильно?' for explicit confirmation. Example: 'Denis, to confirm: you are in Yekaterinburg, need 4 wheels with 4x98 bolt pattern, 14-inch diameter. Correct?'

Product lookup took 78.7 seconds (33.7 seconds over limit). For complex database searches, provide status updates to customer every 20-30 seconds ('Еще минутку...') and complete search within 45 seconds. If unable, offer callback with information.

coaching_priorities.issue: Missing thank you after long search
coaching_priorities.recommendation: After completing the 78-second product search, should have said 'Спасибо за ожидание' (Thank you for waiting) before providing results. This acknowledges customer patience during extended lookup.

Call ended without collecting complete customer address or phone number. Essential for order confirmation. Must obtain: full name, phone number, street address, city, postal code before call conclusion.

7.1.evidence: Greeting includes company name '54 колеса', operator name 'Ирина', offer to help 'Как я могу к вам обращаться?'. Closing includes thanks 'Благодарю вас. Спасибо за звонок' and farewell 'До свидания.'

7.2.evidence: Contact data collected (name Denis, city Yekaterinburg, product code) without systematic echo method. City partially echoed but no explicit confirmation. Product code unclear if confirmed.
7.2.note: Word-level JSON analysis confirms echo method not properly implemented throughout call

7.3.evidence: Intro at 3.147 seconds (within 5s threshold). Disconnect at 2.3 seconds after last speech (within 5s threshold).

7.4.evidence: No clear interruptions without apology detected. Operator clarifies product code gently without abrupt cutoffs.

9.1.evidence: Search announced at 1:51.105, results delivered at 3:09.658. Total search duration 78.7 seconds, exceeding 45-second violation threshold.
9.1.note: No customer status check-ins during search

9.3.evidence: After 78-second search completion, operator did not explicitly say 'спасибо за ожидание' (thank you for waiting). Went directly to results.
9.3.note: Technical violation, though customer did not express frustration

6.1.evidence: No critical silence >45 seconds detected. Longest silence gaps were within normal parameters (5.26s max). Customer did not hang up.

3.1.evidence: Customer needed 4 discs for next-day installation. Operator confirmed discs available only for after-tomorrow pickup. Customer's timeline need could not be met. Customer declined reserve offer due to inability to access store (works late, store closes 8pm).
3.1.note: Borderline: Operator provided available solution (reserve) but customer's original request (next-day delivery) was not fulfilled. Product availability issue rather than operator failure.

3.3.evidence: No confidential information disclosed. Store hours and address provided are public business information.

3.6.evidence: Operator announced system lookup: 'Сейчас я посмотрю, их открою' (Now I'll look them up). Information came from database/system, not from memory.

5.1.evidence: Call ended without collecting complete address or phone number. Operator never asked for customer's phone number. Address collection attempt (around 5:00-5:20) was unclear and incomplete (no house number, apartment, or postal code recorded).
5.1.note: Critical gap: Cannot process order without phone number and complete address

10.2.evidence: Information about payment methods, availability, pickup location, and store hours provided. Logical flow from product inquiry to availability to solution options.

10.3.evidence: Operator uses customer name 'Денис' throughout call. Builds rapport by clarifying product specifications. Maintains professional, helpful tone. Proper opening and closing.

10.6.evidence: Accurate information provided about product availability, specifications, and store location/hours. However, incomplete final information package due to missing contact details.

2.1.evidence: Call ended normally with proper farewell. Operator offered to help and customer thanked operator. No abrupt disconnection or service refusal.

1.1.evidence: No profanity or harsh language detected. Professional, polite tone throughout conversation.

4.1.evidence: Customer was polite and reasonable despite frustration about scheduling. Operator maintained professional demeanor. No tone decline detected in text.
4.1.note: Text-based assessment only; full tone evaluation deferred to audio analysis

positive_observations: Professional greeting with company name and operator identification
Thorough product specification lookup and explanation
Patience in clarifying product code with customer
Offered creative solution (reserve option) when timeline couldn't be met
Proper call closure with thanks and farewell
Used customer name consistently (Denis) to build rapport
Accurate information about store hours and locations

data_quality.confidence_notes: Word-level JSON timestamps available and used for precise timing analysis. Transcript clear and complete.
